This plan is the culmination of significant work and input from district employees, parents, and community members. This plan will help shape our decisions in direction and resource allocation. More importantly, this plan outlines the steps we will take over the next 5 years to continue our well-documented Tradition of Excellence. The overarching themes of this plan are to continue our Tradition of Excellence by increasing efficiency, improving communication and transparency, and to remain a "district of choice" in Northern Kentucky by continuing to be a great place to work and an even better place to educate children! I will be working diligently over the next 5 years with our Board of Education and district employees to implement the goals and objectives outlined in this plan in a manner that remains consistent and responsible to our students, employees, parents, and community.

It's a great time to be a Bearcat!
